page.title: 12Sherburn-in-Elmet Churches.
page.content: All Saints Church is the Church of England,the vicar is Reverend Post.The Chapel is Methodist,the minister is Mr.Calver.St.Joseph the Worker is Roman Catholic,the priest is Father Moxon.The dates when they were built are:All Saints 1200,the Chapel 1872, St.Joseph's 1984.They are all places of worship.All Saints is on Church Hill.The Chapel and St Joseph's are on Low Street in the centre of the village.The Church is built with stone,the Chapel and St.Joseph's are made of brick.In All Saints the stained glass windows are different ages and they each tell a story. The Chapel has a plain rose window and St. Joseph's has two yellow windows and one stained glass window in a modern design which cost Â£1,000 to put in.
